scripts.build-chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome-extension; cp -r src/* chrome/src/* dist/chrome-extension && zip -j dist/chrome-extension.zip dist/chrome-extension/*
scripts.build-firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox-extension; cp -r src/* firefox/src/* dist/firefox-extension && zip -j dist/firefox-extension.zip dist/firefox-extension/*
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build-chrome && yarn build-firefox
